verses.verse: <S%H3426>There<s%> is an <S%H9567>evil<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%> and it is <S%H7227>prevalent<s%> <S%H5921>among<s%> <S%H120>men<s%> –

a <S%H376>man<s%> to <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H6239>riches<s%> and <S%H5233>wealth<s%> and <S%H9202>honor<s%> so that his <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H2638>lacks<s%> <S%H369>nothing<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> that he <S%H183>desires,<s%> but <S%H430>God<s%> has not <S%H7980>empowered<s%> him to <S%H398>eat<s%> from them, for a <S%H5237>foreigner<s%> <S%H398>enjoys<s%> them. <S%H2088>This<s%> is <S%H1892>vanity<s%> and a <S%H7451>severe<s%> <S%H2483>affliction.<s%>

<S%H518>If<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3205>fathers<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> [children] and <S%H2421>lives<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> however <S%H7227>many<s%> they be, but his <S%H5315>soul<s%> is not <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> with <S%H9186>good<s%> <S%H9186>things,<s%> and he does not <S%H1571>even<s%> <S%H1961>have<s%> a [proper] <S%H6900>burial,<s%> [then] I <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H2896>"Better<s%> the <S%H5309>miscarriage<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> he,
for it <S%H935>comes<s%> in <S%H1892>futility<s%> and <S%H1980>goes<s%> into <S%H2822>obscurity;<s%> and its <S%H8034>name<s%> is <S%H3680>covered<s%> in <S%H2822>obscurity.<s%>
"It <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H7200>sees<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%> and it <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> [anything;] it is <S%H5183>better<s%> off <S%H4480>than<s%> he.

"Even <S%H432>if<s%> the [other] man <S%H2421>lives<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H6471>twice<s%> and does not <S%H7200>enjoy<s%> <S%H9186><s%> <S%H9186>good<s%> <S%H9186>things<s%> – do not <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1980>go<s%> to <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%>?"
<S%H3605>All<s%> a man's <S%H5999>labor<s%> is for his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> and <S%H1571>yet<s%> the <S%H5315>appetite<s%> is not <S%H4390>satisfied.<s%>

For <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H3148>advantage<s%> does the <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H2450>man<s%> have <S%H4480>over<s%> the <S%H3684>fool<s%>? <S%H4100>What<s%> [advantage] does the <S%H6041>poor<s%> <S%H6041>man<s%> have, <S%H3045>knowing<s%> [how] to <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> the <S%H2416>living<s%>?

<S%H4758>What<s%> the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H4758>see<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> what the <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H1980>desires.<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> <S%H1571>too<s%> is <S%H1892>futility<s%> and a <S%H7469>striving<s%> after <S%H7307>wind.<s%>

<S%H4100>Whatever<s%> <S%H7945><s%> <S%H1961>exists<s%> has <S%H3528>already<s%> been <S%H7121>named,<s%> <S%H8034><s%> and it is <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> is; for he <S%H3201>cannot<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H1777>dispute<s%> with him <S%H7945>who<s%> is <S%H8623>stronger<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> he is.
For <S%H3426>there<s%> are <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> which <S%H7235>increase<s%> <S%H1892>futility.<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> [then] is the <S%H3148>advantage<s%> to a <S%H120>man<s%>?

For <S%H4310>who<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> is <S%H2896>good<s%> for a <S%H120>man<s%> during [his] <S%H9132>lifetime,<s%> [during] the <S%H4557>few<s%> <S%H3117>years<s%> of his <S%H1892>futile<s%> <S%H9132>life<s%>? He will <S%H6213>spend<s%> them like a <S%H6738>shadow.<s%> For <S%H4310>who<s%> can <S%H5046>tell<s%> a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> will be <S%H310>after<s%> him <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%>?
